Yes, there are several places where you can have a picnic while enjoying the view of the Rhine River in Wiesbaden:

1. Rheinwiesen: The Rheinwiesen is a large grassy area located along the banks of the Rhine River. It is a popular spot for picnics and barbecues and offers great views of the river.

2. Schlosspark Biebrich: Schlosspark Biebrich has several beautiful areas where you can have a picnic while enjoying the view of the Rhine River. You can find a peaceful spot under a tree or set up a picnic blanket on the grass.

3. Kurpark: Kurpark has several scenic areas where you can have a picnic while enjoying the view of the Rhine River. It has several benches and tables available for use, or you can find a quieter spot on the grass.

4. Neroberg: Neroberg has several beautiful picnic areas located at the top of the hill. You can enjoy the view of the city and the Rhine River while having lunch.
